attributes.action: make life easier for teenagers who practice religions such as Wicca to continue their religion within school hours without feeling discriminated.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a devout Wiccan and I find it hard to practice my religion as my school, and parents do not feel that I should have the right to celebrate my 'holy days' just because they are not recognised by my school. Christian teenagers do not have to go to school on Christmas, yet I still have to go to school on the day my religion has its new year,its not equal.
